statements: DELETE FROM credit_scoring WHERE id = 123 AND customer_id = 456;
DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE customer_id = 100 AND fraud_score > 50;
DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_score > 50 AND customer_id = 100;
DELETE FROM credit_scores WHERE customer_id = 100 AND score > 700;
DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE customer_id = 100 AND detection_result = true;
DELETE FROM users WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 100 AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
DELETE FROM CustomerInformation WHERE name = 'John Doe';
